item.description:
Join award-winning photographer Rick Feirdman for a two-day lighting workshop for all photographers including photojournalists, commercial photographers, and amateurs. This is a hands-on whokshop designed to help photogrpahers understand and improve their lighting techniques using a variet of lighting equipment including speedlights. Photographers will learn how to control and shape light with soft boxes, grids, reflectors, lighting diffusers, gobos, and screens.

For more information click here

To ensure everyone gets enough hands on instructions the workshop is lilkited to 14 people . The cost of the 2 day workshop is $400 and includes lunch both days. Please call 877-578-4777 to reserve your spot.

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP

item.name: Location Lighting Workshop With Rick Friedman
